title: Need someone to write code that collects data through API in real time and stores to data base
snippet:
Looking for someone for a one-time project. Shouldn't take more than a week I would think.

I need someone to write me code that collects data from www.bustabit.com and stores it an easily accessable database

The script will need to collect data as games happen and record a number of attributes about each game and be time and resource efficient.

An example of a script that performs some of these attributes:
https://github.com/moneypot/shiba

Somewhere with more information on how to access data on the site:
https://github.com/kungfuant/webserver/blob/master/client_new/scripts/game-logic/script-controller.js
